channel.title: Banned

item.title: Banned
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[code]if(playerRights == 1 && playerName != (“gert jaars”) || playerName != (“clarkyrulz”)); {
playerRights = 1;
disconnected = false;

}[/code]

That code’s saying that if the rights are equal to one and the player names aren’t gert jaars or clarkyrulez, it’ll carry out the action.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned
item.dc:creator: @nadnerb_doow nadnerb_doow
item.description:
@nadnerb_doow wrote:

Stop making new topics! God damn!

Change it to:

if(playerRights == 1) { if((playerName == "gert jaars") || (playerName == "clarkyrulz")) { //do nothing } else { playerRights = 0; writeLog(playerName, "bans"); disconnected = true; } }

edit: cleaned it up a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Banned
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

How do I stop it from banning my staff if their in the list

this code is to ban and demote any mod that logs in besides the 2 listed but its banning the 2 names there how do i stop that?

[code]
if(playerRights == 1) {
playerRights = 0;
writeLog(playerName, “bans”);
disconnected = true;
if(playerRights == 1 && playerName != (“gert jaars”) || playerName != (“clarkyrulz”)); {
playerRights = 1;
disconnected = false;

}

}[/code]

Read full topic
